original_title: Samuel Wilder King: Fighting For Statehood
overview: Samuel Wilder King: Fighting for Statehood tells the story of Samuel Wilder King's service in WWI and WWII, including his efforts to minimized the internment of Japanese Americans in Hawaii, as well as his post-war efforts that led to the territory becoming the 50th State of the Union.
tagline: To join the republic, Hawaii needed a King.
title: Samuel Wilder King: Fighting For Statehood
